text: get count installed packages library locations, optionally total sizes, use ‘lib_summary()’ function: special using README.Rmd instead just README.md? can include R chunks like : ’ll still need render README.Rmd regularly, keep README.md --date. devtools::build_readme() handy . can also embed plots, example: case, don’t forget commit push resulting figure files, display GitHub CRAN.
